title: My Favorite Color is Your Something Blue
description: Perfect for fans of Kasie West, this fun, light-hearted, and sweet summer romance book is great for teens, tweens, or anyone.Sometimes, love is messy.The last thing Morgan wants is to spend one of her final weekends before school starts at a wedding in a tiny town in the middle of nowhere. But that’s exactly what she’s doing since her favorite childhood babysitter is getting married.Maybe it won’t be so bad—more of a relaxing getaway. But then they introduce her to him.Will Jameson. Tall. Super cute. And sweet. Or so they say. A younger cousin to the groom, he’s also in the wedding.But…they’ve already met. Briefly. When he spilled blue slush all over her at a gas station.Words were exchanged.And now, the bride and groom are trying to set them up. It’s a good thing Morgan swore off dating until college.There’s no way she’s interested. Right?Your Something Blue is a sweet YA romance Kindle book with small-town charm and cozy lake-side vibes. The My Favorite Color novels are dual-point-of-view, clean romance books for teens, perfect for readers of any age.
author: Eva Austin
